text: Nobuyuki Idei (出井 伸之, Idei Nobuyuki; November 22, 1937 – June 2, 2022) was a Japanese businessman. He was chairman and group chief executive officer of Sony Corporation from 1999 until 2005. He was a director of General Motors, Baidu, Yoshimoto Kogyo and Nestlé. Idei was born in Tokyo, Japan. Idei died on June 2, 2022 in Tokyo from liver failure, aged 84. ==References== ==Other websites== * Biography * "ZL Technologies Appoints Former CEO of SONY to Its Advisory Board" * Nobuyuki Idei anfiniti Category:1937 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Japanese businesspeople Category:People from Tokyo Category:Deaths from liver failure
